d.name: Nurse
d.phase: Whilst walking through Dinotown, you notice someone beckoning you towards them...
d.a: Hello young lady....(Wow)!
d.phase: Hello Dinoz master, my name is Anna Tomie, I've just arrived in Dinotown and I need your help.
d.a: Of course! What can I do for you ?
Stare at her blissfully...
d.phase: Well, although I've just arrived in Dinotown and I am very talented, there's nowhere for me to work! I'd really like to build a clinic so I can help heal Dinoz... I've got permission from the King, but I haven't found the right place to build it yet........it seems no-one likes the idea of living next to a busy clinic!
d.a: It might be a problem, but it's all for a good cause.
You're not from Dinotown, are you?
d.phase: You're right, I actually come from a region in the north, but I decided to leave so that I could on my own. Psssssss! Anna Tomie isn't my real name, but don't tell anyone! I just wanted to blend in more. But that's not the point, were you even listening to me in the first place?
d.a: Sorry, what were you saying?
d.phase: Well I was wondering if you wouldn't mind going around Dinotown for me and asking people where the best place to build a clinic would be... It would be really kind of you sweetie!
d.a: I'll run, I'll fly, I'll jump....... but where should I go first?
d.phase: Anna has already left to talk to someone else. If you want to impress her, it would be better to keep quiet!
It seems you're not the person I'm after......too bad.

d.name: Professor Eugene
d.a: I'm looking for somewhere to build a clinic!
d.phase: Ha! You've been tricked by the beautiful nurse too! You're not the first person to come and see me about this... But I can't have such a noisy neighbour, we need to have peace and quiet in order to study!
d.a: That's a shame, there's loads of free space here. It seems like it would be a great location for a clinic.
d.phase: Don't push it, there are already too many buildings in Dinotown as it is, you'd be better off looking elsewhere.
d.a: Ok, ok, I'll go and ask someone else then.
d.phase: You leave disappointed, who else could possibly help you?

d.name: Michael The Guide
d.a: Ask where would be a good place to build a clinic.
d.phase: A clinic? That's a great idea, Dinotown doesn't have one at the moment, You'll need to find an isolated location for a building of that size... maybe you'd be better off looking in the west of the town? Go and see what you can find.
d.a: Thanks, you've been really helpful!
d.phase: You set off for Dinotown.

d.name: Wine Merchant
d.phase: Good day! Allow me to guide you through our finest vintages, the pompelope 142 is succulent, l'extremitédeau 144 is extremely rare. You should buy some bottles before a wine collector buys all my stock!
d.a: I'm actually looking for somewhere to build a clinic.
d.phase: A clinic?.... What's that got to do with me? I don't think the patients would want to drink wine.
d.a: It seems you use a lot of land to cultivate the Dinotown vintage, but you've already told me that it's disgusting and tastes of vinegar!

Ah, but you're wrong! Once they've been cured, the patients will come to your shop to buy some wine! The nurse has even promised me that she'll come and give you a hand in the shop! (...a little white lie never hurts...)
d.phase: Oh yeah! And who says that this person knows enough about wine to be able to sell it, huh?
d.a: To be honest, seeing how crazy the Dinoz masters are, I don't think she needs to know much...
d.phase: Well, I might be able to sacrifice part of my vineyard... it wouldn't be a great loss. COUGH COUGH, I didn't say anything...
d.a: I didn't hear anything!
d.phase: The Wine Merchant agrees to sacrifice part of his vineyard so it can be used to build the clinic.
I was wrong, your clinic isn't as important as my wine! Get out of my sight!

d.name: Anna Tomie
d.phase: Ah, finally some good news from my little hero I hope!
d.a: (Hero?...Gulp).... I've found the perfect location for you to build your clinic!
d.phase: Yippee! Quick, tell me where it is!
d.a: The Wine Merchant is willing to sacrifice part of his vineyard so that you can build your clinic.
d.phase: The Wine Merchant? He's cute, hehe! Ok, go and take a look at the land, I need to go and thank the Wine Merchant.
d.a: But I did all the work!
Yes, but it's thanks to him that we'll be able to build a fantastic clinic.
d.phase: Anna has already left without you.

d.name: Anna Tomie
d.phase: Finally, we've found the perfect location to build the clinic. Now all we need to do is figure out how we're going to build it...
d.a: What?
d.phase: I'm only a weak nurse, do you really think I'm capable of building the clinic on my own with these tiny hands?
d.a: Are you suggesting we build the clinic ourselves?
d.phase: No, you should ask your friends to help you. As strong as you may be, you'd be better off being part of a clan!
d.a: But how many Dinoz do I need to have?
d.phase: It's not important, but the more you have, the quicker you'll finish building the clinic. It's best to be in a clan with the maximum number of Dinoz.
d.a: I'll see what I can do....
d.phase: Thanks! I knew I could count on you!
d.a: I'll be back with more Dinoz!
d.phase: Make sure to have as many Dinoz as possible in your clan so that you can build the clinic as quickly as possible.

d.name: Anna Tomie
d.phase: What? You've already finished? Let me see!
You show Anna the clinic after spending countless hours painstakingly building it. You're very proud of yourself and your team, it would never have been possible without your excellent team spirit!

d.name: Anna Tomie
d.phase: Well done, you and your friends have managed to build an impressive clinic. I've seen better, but still..............it's not bad.
d.a: Hufff, hufff, but I gave it my all...
d.phase: That wasn't to say I'm not extremely grateful to you. Come and see me from time to time, I'll give you my services for free!
d.a: Thanks very much Miss!
d.phase: Actually it's Mrs............sorry little one.

d.name: Anna Tomie
d.phase: Your Clan can't access the clinic until it has been built, please build the clinic so that I can help heal your Dinoz.
d.a: But...
d.phase: Hurry up! Get to work!

d.name: Anna Tomie
d.phase: Hello Dinoz master, I can help you to fully heal one of your Dinoz. All you need to do is to leave them with me for a day. You can then come back and collect them once they've been fully healed.
d.a: Heal your Dinoz! It's on its last legs!
Heal your Dinoz! It's on its last legs!
Heal your Dinoz! It's on its last legs!
Is there anything else I can help you with?
I would like to carry out some cosmetic surgery on one of my dinoz.
d.phase: Ok! Come and collect your Dinoz in an hour, it'll be as good as new!
How was that? The wait wasn't too long was it?
Sorry, you can only heal one Dinoz per day. Please come back another day.
I have a list of missions I need you to do for me, I'm sure you'll have fun!
d.a: I'll see to them right away!
No, I can't.......not this time!
d.phase: You run away, swearing to yourself that you'll never let anyone take advantage of you again!
Are you sure? The operation is irreversible, and can only be done once per month! Don't come back to complain if your surgeon drank too much Angel Potion last night!
d.a: Yes, I'm sure - my dinoz isn't scary enough on the battlefield!
Actually no, my dinoz might have a strange boat race, but I've gotten quite used to it!
d.phase: OK, so what happens now is that your dinoz will hop up on the slab, you can come back and collect it in an hour!
Your dinoz looks at you fondly, what freakish future have you arranged for your companion...
